item.title: How to Upload New Entry
item.description: a memo. on RStudio’s Console new_post("title") write new posts serve_site() build_sites() Next, move on to Terminal git add . git commit -am "any comment" git push -u origin master enjoy!

item.title: 痛みのOPQRST
item.description: 概要 Symbol Discription O Onset P Palliative/provocative Q Quality R Region S assosiated Symptoms T Time course ポイント まずOとTを聞く！ Q, R, P, Sはclosed questionで攻める。 Onset 最重要！ sudden / acute / gradual のいずれか
定義 \[ LR+ := \frac{感度}{1-特異度} \] \[ LR- := \frac{1-感度}{特異度} \] 目安 \(\ge5, \le\frac{1}{5}\)で中くらい、 \(\ge10, \l

item.title: About me
item.description: My name is Inigo Montoya. I have the following qualities: I rock a great mustache I’m extremely loyal to my family What else do you need? my history To be honest, I’m having some trouble remembering right now, so why don’t you just watch my movie and it will answer all your questions.
